summary: okay let's be honest, the fact that tony could even still make a kid is a miracle on it's own. dude went through so much trauma...
body:
okay let’s be honest, the fact that tony could even still make a kid is a miracle on it’s own. dude went through so much trauma that fucked up his body and he still had the ability to get pepper pregnant???

alcoholism for what was probably decades, no doubt heavy drug use when he was young, afghanistan, the arc reactor, heavy metal poisoning, siberia, the countless lab accidents and injuries as iron man, nearly starving to death in space???

it’s a wonder morgan exists at all, tbh.

reblog.comment:
okay let’s be honest, the fact that tony could even still make a kid is a miracle on it’s own. dude went through so much trauma that fucked up his body and he still had the ability to get pepper pregnant???

it’s a wonder morgan exists at all, tbh.

it’s a wonder morgan exists at all, tbh.

blog.title: UnknownUnseenUnheard
blog.description:
Ao3: UnknownUnseenUnheard

I'm a guy. I wouldn't even bother saying that, but it does seem to be important in this site lol...

I kinda just scroll through here when I'm bored. You'll mostly find whatever Fandom I'm currently invested in here, which can range from Kingdom Hearts, Final Fantasy, Star Wars Legends, D.C. comics, Marvel Comics, About a dozen anime, Buffy, Er... the list goes on for a while tbh

summary: Hydra: *reveals they’ve infiltrated every major country on the planet and that they quiet literally have sleeper agents all over...
body:
Hydra: *reveals they’ve infiltrated every major country on the planet and that they quiet literally have sleeper agents all over the world*

Tony, immediately: Guyyyys, we should let the government tell us where we can and can’t go and also let them track where we are 24/7 and also let them keep files on our biometrics and…

title: Crushed Petals
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2KhR4FM

by twyly56

2014 Nebula runs into Morgan, and the little girl can tell something is not right with her blue aunt. But Nebula can’t quite bring herself to kill the child. She isn’t sure why.

blog.description: Mibba is a creative writing site designed for authors to share their stories, poems and articles and gain feedback from a growing audience.

title: Clarity
body:
He suddenly realized that something was missing in his life and that something was her. Formerly titled High Voltage. An Iron Man fanfic set between the first two Iron Man movies. Tony/OC.

Chapter 8

“Alright, Jarvis, run a quick simulation of the upgraded suit."She heard Tony’s voice behind the glass frames that seemed to protect anyone on her side from all the experiments and possible explosions…

Read more…

title: Three Thousand
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Icnyz8

by WhoStarLocked

“It’s the little moments, Tony.” Clint says.

Tony has had a yearning for a family, for people to love him, for him to love, for years. He talks about it with Clint, sometimes. Clint gets it. After Thanos, Tony finally gets it, and gets a little moment of his own.

(this summary is kind of bad)

  • Rating: General Audiences

summary: I Love You 3000 - wr0ngsideofreality (slothlover42) - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: I Love You 3000 - wr0ngsideofreality (slothlover42) - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 6/?
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Characters: Pepper Potts, Tony Stark, Morgan Stark (Marvel Cinematic Universe), James “Rhodey” Rhodes
Additional Tags: Alternate Universes, Multiverse, Eventual Relationships, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Post-Avengers: Endgame (Movie), Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Spoilers
Summary:

A breach in the multiverse has a Tony from somewhere else dropping into a world that’s just lost their Tony. With the pain of losing her husband still fresh, Pepper has a hard time letting this new Tony into her and her daughter’s life. Little does she know, this Tony feels the same way.

Will they push past the hurt and find love for Morgan? What happens when someone from Tony’s universe comes knocking? When all is said and done, could Pepper find it in herself to let Tony leave to his universe?

WE ARE 6 (SIX) CHAPTERS IN AND STILL GOING STRONG. UPDATES TAKE ME TEN YEARS BUT I WON’T STOP TILL THIS IS DONE!!!!! 

@itismarvelicious has given me a lot of freedom with this beautiful idea and I thank you for it. You are a genius for coming up with the idea. If you haven’t looked at the original post, y’all gotta look at it. I take 12% of the credit for this masterpiece. Seriously, thank you again for letting me have a lot of freedom with this. It’s a really fantastic thing to be writing.

title: Unintentional Fatherhood - awesomerosie - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Steve Rogers & Tony Stark, Howard Stark/Maria Stark
Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Howard Stark, Maria Stark
Additional Tags: Fluff and Angst, Humor, Underage Drinking, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Alzheimer’s Disease, Family Feels, So many widgets, dangit I just read it why can’t I figure out tags?, Steve tries really hard to understand the gadgets lying around the house, Kid Tony, Dad Steve
Summary:

Imagine Steve didn’t freeze. He discovers Howard has a son, after a thorough introduction to their family life, ends up invading a little bit. Will Steve’s experience with Howard help build a connection with Tony? Or will it all collapse around him like a flan in a cupboard? Find out next time on…
Captain AmeriDad!

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Paint My Love
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IdjqPb

by peachymaximoff

James “Bucky” Barnes is the hit art critic of the time, practically deciding which artists become famous through his harsh and brutally honest critiques. After being invited to a brand new gallery opening in New York City, a certain artist catches his eye— one under the name of Steve Rogers, an ex-soldier who’s building a reputation in the art world. Wanting to help the rising artist, Bucky goes to meet up with him to discuss work— and quickly discovers that the paintings aren’t the only special thing about Steve.

Words: 7478, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Tony Stark, Wanda Maximoff, Clint Barton, Sharon Carter (Marvel)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - Artists, Artist Steve Rogers, Art Critic Bucky, Love Confessions, business partners to lovers, bucky is conflicted and gay


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IdjqPb

title: The Prince Has Returned
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IEaukZ

by Kathendale

After being found guilty for his crimes on Midgard, Loki is banished to Helheim, where he meets his long lost sister, Hela. The two bond over their hatred of Odin and eventually break free. When Loki goes to Jotunheim, is it to make amends with his birthworld, or to destroy it once and for all?

Words: 7, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Thor (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Laufey (Marvel), Helblindi (Marvel), Byleistr (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Odin (Marvel), Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Phil Coulson, Nick Fury, Hela (Marvel), Original Male Character(s)
  • Relationships: Loki (Marvel)/Original Male Character(s), Other Relationship Tags to Be Added
  • Additional Tags: Jötunheimr | Jotunheim, Jotunn | Frost Giant, Jotunn Loki (Marvel), Banished Loki (Marvel), Gungnir, Helheimr | Hel (Realm)


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IEaukZ

blog.name: lovelytonys
blog.title: tony stark & mcu
blog.description: A gal who is very passionate about a red-and-gold-armor-wearing hero. Call me Kay (or K, whichever).

summary: And today on fic ideas that I will never to be able to develop enough to write: The idea of a post-Endgame fic centering on Gary...
body:
And today on fic ideas that I will never to be able to develop enough to write:

The idea of a post-Endgame fic centering on Gary from Iron Man 3 keeps nagging at me. Just imagine it. At first, he’s grief stricken. He thinks he’ll never be happy again. He doesn’t call off that month’s meeting of the Rose Hill Chapter of the Iron Man Appreciation Society- of which there are five people, and he is the president- but it’s just so sad. He can’t cope. But then, suddenly things change. Some days later, he texts the Rose Hill Iron Man Appreciation group chat and calls for an emergency meeting where he tells his friends what he’s convinced himself of- Tony Stark is alive. The rest of them start to believe it, too. So what do they do? Naturally, they set out on a quest to find him. I can only imagine them journeying across the Eastern U.S or even the whole country just in search of evidence. Who knows what kind of trouble they get into- the rogue villain, the occasional monster, maybe a run-in or two with government agencies- and it all culminates with them finally reaching New York, where the New Avengers Facility is mostly rebuilt. Where Tony Stark died. Somehow, they make it onto the premises, and they feel like they’ll have to find answers here. But, to the group’s ultimate dismay, there is nothing. Before long, whichever Avengers are in the facility- I imagine Rhodey and a few others- come prepared to attack the fan club, only to realize what’s going on. Instead of calling any authorities, the present Avengers first confirm that Tony truly is dead, but then, since they have a soft spot for Tony and feel they have an obligation to be kind to this group of souls feeling lost in a world without Iron Man, they invite Gary and his friends into what is finished of the facility. The interior is still mostly empty, but Rhodey & co. share what they can of Tony- maybe a few pictures, maybe an old faceplate, whatever they have moved into the place (because you KNOW there’s gonna be a whole Iron Man memorial room in there). After that very surreal and touching experience, Gary and his friends are left with the task of truly accepting that their hero is gone. It would be a sort of off-beat, sometimes lighthearted but also pathetic and sad exploration of grief post-Endgame, and interesting because it’s removed from Tony’s inner circle of friends and family. If only I could actually fully write it

blog.name: beenasleepfor70years
blog.title: The Prodigal Daughter Hath Returned
blog.description: AJ~ 24 ~ Returning blog to share SteveTony things and post my own SteveTony things from time to time. Howdy.

body:
BECAUSE I AM CURIOUS

What universe Steves and Tony’s do you want to see me try and draw a bit more? I kinda default to MCU because its the universe I know the most, but I am down to know and appreciate all Steves and Tonys UwU
